tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_medical_records (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  diagnosis TEXT,
  procedure TEXT,
  medication TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patient_records (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    surgery_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE surgery_simulations (
    simulation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES patient_records(patient_id),
    simulation_date TIMESTAMP,
    surgeon_name VARCHAR(100),
    success BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE patient_records (
  record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(100),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  medical_history TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE surgical_team (
  team_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  surgeon_name VARCHAR(100),
  assistant_name VARCHAR(100),
  nurse_name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE surgery_logs (
  log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES patient_records(record_id),
  operation_date DATE,
  procedure_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  dob DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  diagnosis TEXT,
  treatment TEXT,
  date_created DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    blood_type VARCHAR(5)
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (
    record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    record_description VARCHAR(1000),
    record_date DATE,
    doctor_name VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Surgeries (
    surgery_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    surgery_type VARCHAR(100),
    surgery_date DATE,
    surgeon_name VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SurgeryRecords (
    surgery_record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    surgery_id UUID,
    tool_id UUID,
    record_description VARCHAR(1000),
    FOREIGN KEY (surgery_id) REFERENCES Surgeries(surgery_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (tool_id) REFERENCES SurgicalTools(tool_id)
);
